item.title: iPhone 17 is coming to India this year: Everything we know - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 is coming to India this year: Everything we know

Publication Date: 2025-01-01 Source: India Today

The upcoming iPhone 17 series is set to revolutionize the smartphone experience with several innovative features and models.

  • Four models expected, possibly replacing the Plus model with an Air variant.
  • The iPhone 17 lineup will feature 120Hz ProMotion and always-on displays.
  • Expected upgrades include a 48MP rear camera and a 6.6-inch display for the new models.
  • All models may get a 24-megapixel front-facing camera upgrade for better selfies and video calls.
  • The Pro Max model could feature three 48-megapixel rear cameras, enhancing mobile photography.
  • Adjustable aperture may be available on select models for enhanced photographic control.
  • All models powered by the latest A19 chip; Pro models to have an A19 Pro chip.
  • Apple’s own 5G modem and Wi-Fi 7 chip may debut in upcoming models.
  • A new multifunction button may replace traditional controls in the Pro models.
  • Durability enhancements are being developed in collaboration with Corning.
“Apple is reportedly working with Corning to enhance durability with scratch-resistant, anti-reflective glass for better outdoor visibility and protection.”

The iPhone 17 promises significant upgrades and features that aim to set new standards in the smartphone market.

item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 International Model Spotted On Geekbench, Hinting At Snapdragon 8 Elite Exclusivity

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Geekbench

Recent leaks about the Samsung Galaxy S25 series suggest the incorporation of Snapdragon processors for the international variant, as evidenced by its listing on Geekbench.

  • The Galaxy S25, model SM-S931B, is expected to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, implying a possible shift towards Snapdragon chips for all regions.
  • Geekbench scores for the Galaxy S25 prototype show 2,986 single-core and 9,355 multi-core performance.
  • The Galaxy S25 lineup is anticipated to launch in January 2025, with preorders starting in South Korea on January 24.
  • The retail version is expected to offer improved performance and will run on Android 15 with 12GB of RAM.
“As the official announcement approaches, more details about the Galaxy S25 series are anticipated.”

This leak further intensifies the anticipation for Samsung's upcoming flagship devices, particularly regarding their processing power and release timeline.

item.title: Researchers are developing AI system that will let humans 'talk' to animals - Firstpost
item.description:
Researchers Developing AI System to Facilitate Communication with Animals

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Firstpost

The Earth Species Project has introduced NatureLM, an AI designed to decode animal communication, aiming to enhance human-animal interactions.

  • NatureLM can identify animal species and context, including age and emotional state.
  • The AI is capable of understanding communications from species it hasn’t directly encountered before.
  • Efforts are underway to address the biodiversity crisis, fostering a deeper connection with the natural world.
  • Research showcases that some animals, like prairie dogs, use complex languages that combine nouns and adjectives.
  • NatureLM is part of a larger trend of using AI to tackle environmental issues, such as climate change.
“Decoding animal communication could bridge the gap between humans and the natural world,” said Katie Zacarian, CEO of the Earth Species Project.

As technologies like NatureLM evolve, they may significantly change our understanding of animal behavior and rights, moving us closer to a time when we can communicate with animals more effectively.

item.description:
realme 14 Pro series to launch soon: 50MP periscope camera, 120X zoom, and more confirmed

Publication Date: March 2024 Source: CNBC TV18

Smartphone maker realme is set to release its 14 Pro series later this month, showcasing impressive camera specifications.

  • Features a 50MP triple-reflection periscope camera with 120x super zoom.
  • 8MP ultrawide lens for expansive shots.
  • 32MP autofocus front camera for high-quality selfies and video calls.
  • Powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 7300 chipset.
  • Expected to run on Android 15 with 8GB of RAM.
  • The realme 14 Pro+ is rumored to have a 6.83-inch 1.5K AMOLED display and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The pricing for the new series is expected to be similar to the previous realme 13 Pro series.
“The camera system includes a triple-flash setup for enhanced low-light photography.”

The realme 14 Pro series aims to bring enhanced photography capabilities and robust performance in a competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Apple's Upcoming iPhone SE 4 Will Reportedly Be Called the iPhone 16E - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Apple's Upcoming Affordable iPhone May Not Carry the SE Moniker

Publication Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Gadgets 360

Apple's next affordable iPhone, anticipated in the first quarter, may break tradition by not being called the SE. This shift could align it more with the iPhone 16 lineup.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to be named iPhone 16E.
  • It may feature the A18 chipset and Apple Intelligence capabilities.
  • The design is rumored to be similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Expected specifications include a 6.06-inch LTPS OLED display and a 48-megapixel rear camera.
  • Pricing is projected to be under $500.
“Based on what my source has reported, it seems that the new iPhone that Apple will unveil in 2025 will not be called iPhone SE4, but iPhone 16E.” — Majin Bu

This change indicates Apple's strategy to differentiate its affordable model while remaining competitive in the market.

item.title: LG Gram 2025 ‘Hybrid AI’ Laptops With Intel Arrow Lake Chip, Cloud AI Services Unveiled: Features - Gadgets 360
item.description:
LG Gram 2025 Laptops With Cloud-Based and On-Device AI Features Unveiled

Publication Date: Tuesday, ahead of CES 2025. Source: Gadgets 360

LG has unveiled its updated Gram laptops featuring on-device and cloud-based AI capabilities powered by Intel's latest processors. The laptops are designed for high performance and come with significant new features that enhance user experience.

  • The 2025 LG Gram lineup includes four models: LG Gram Pro, Gram Pro 2-in-1, Gram, and Gram Book.
  • Introducing cloud-based AI features like Gram chat Cloud powered by GPT-4o and on-device AI with a small language model (SLM).
  • The Gram Pro 2-in-1 has received the CES 2025 Innovation Award for its design.
  • All models feature connectivity via Gram Link 2.0, supporting seamless communication between devices.
  • The laptops will be officially launched at CES 2025 in Las Vegas, starting January 7.
“The new Time Travel feature allows users to quickly revisit web pages, documents, videos and audio files.”

This year's lineup is positioned to set new standards in performance and user-friendliness in the evolving laptop market.

item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Renamed to iPhone 16E: What To Expect From Apple In March 2025

Date: October 2023 | Source: Times Now

Apple is set to launch the next-generation iPhone SE 4, now rumored to be called the iPhone 16E, in March 2025. This would be the first update since the iPhone SE 3 was released in March 2024.

  • Upcoming iPhone SE 4 is rumored to be named iPhone 16E.
  • Possible slight price increase; around $500 in Japan and possibly around Rs 50,000 in India.
  • Rumored features include a 6.1-inch OLED display, Face ID, USB-C port, and a 48-megapixel camera.
  • Expected upgrades include Apple-designed 5G modem and a new A-series chip.
The iPhone SE 4 may see a price increase with upgrades like Face ID and a new all-screen design.

The launch of the iPhone 16E is highly anticipated, marking the return of the iPhone SE series with modern features and improvements.

item.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Week: Expected Price, Full Specifications, How To Watch OnePlus Event Live - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 India Launch Next Week: Expected Price, Full Specifications, How To Watch OnePlus Event Live

Publication Date: January 1, 2023 Source: Tech News Network

OnePlus is all set to host its Winter Event on January 7, unveiling its flagship smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, in India. These devices have already launched in China and have generated a lot of excitement among Indian fans.

  • The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000 in India.
  • It features a 6.82-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, promising high performance.
  • Camera system includes three 50MP sensors co-engineered with Hasselblad.
  • Expected to come with a 6,000mAh battery supporting 100W fast charging.
  • Live streaming of the event will be available on the official OnePlus website and YouTube channel.
"Tune in on January 7 to catch all the action as it happens."

The launch of the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R promises to be an exciting event packed with innovation and premium features, reflecting OnePlus's commitment to the Indian market.

item.title: Apple Vision Pro production halted amid weak demand: Report - The Hindu
item.description:
Apple Vision Pro Production Halted Amid Weak Demand

Published: January 02, 2025 Source: The Hindu

The production of Apple's first-generation Vision Pro headset has reportedly stopped due to weak demand. Initially launched as a high-end mixed-reality device, the production has seen significant cuts.

  • The Vision Pro's production was scaled back to just 1,000 units daily by October, a 50% decrease from previous levels.
  • Apple has accumulated an inventory of 500,000 to 600,000 units, enough to meet demand through 2025.
  • The device's high price of $3,499 and limited content availability have led to low sales.
  • Apple plans to pivot towards developing a more affordable mixed-reality headset.
  • Development on a second-generation Vision Pro has been paused for at least a year, although an incremental update for the first generation is possible by late 2025 or early 2026.
“The Vision Pro has struggled to gain traction due to its steep price tag and is viewed as an 'early-adopter product.'”

In conclusion, the halt in production reflects Apple's challenges in the mixed-reality market and a strategic shift towards a more accessible product line.

item.title: Quordle Answer for Today (January 2); Hints, Answers & How to Play? - Gizbot
item.description:
Quordle Answer for Today (January 2); Hints, Answers & How to Play?

Updated: Thursday, January 2, 2025, 9:32 [IST]

Quordle is a unique word game where players solve four puzzles at once. For those looking for today's (Quordle 1074) hints and answers, you can find them below.

Quordle 1074 Hints For January 2, 2025

Starting Letters: U, S, D, I
Ending Letters: Y, E, T, O

  • Word 1 - Make or become united
  • Word 2 - Make a solemn statement or promise undertaking to do something
  • Word 3 - A place for the storage of large quantities of equipment
  • Word 4 - An introduction

Quordle 1074 Answers For January 2, 2025

  • Word 1 - UNIFY
  • Word 2 - SWORE
  • Word 3 - DEPOT
  • Word 4 - INTRO

How to Play Quordle?

Start Quordle by selecting any five-letter word. Each grid will display guessed letters in different colours indicating their position or relevance to the target words.

Green indicates the correct letter and position, yellow means it is in the word but not in the right spot, and grey shows it isn't part of any of the words. Use these colour-coded hints to inform your guesses.

Quordle is both a challenge and enjoyable, so take your time and visit Merriam-Webster's website regularly for updates.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Phones Could Get Google’s Premium AI Features For Free - News18
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Phones to Offer Free Google Gemini AI Features

Published on January 02, 2025, 14:00 IST

The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series is expected to launch with an exciting surprise for buyers. Although the launch date has not been officially confirmed, reports suggest that the new premium phones will come bundled with Google's premium AI service, Gemini.

  1. The Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch is likely in the next few weeks of 2025.
  2. Buyers can expect a free premium AI service, Gemini, with their purchase.
  3. Google has been offering free access to Gemini AI in recent months, and this collaboration with Samsung could be an attempt to attract more users to its premium AI services.
Google has been on an aggressive mode with Gemini AI in the last few months, giving people free access to the Gemini Live version for Android users. Gemini is now available on iOS as a standalone app, and you are gradually noticing the AI chatbot replace Assistant as the default option on Android devices.

The big Samsung launch is widely awaited, and the news about Gemini Advance AI coming for free will surely get people excited for the new phones. However, more details about this bundle are expected to be revealed closer to the official launch.

item.title: Samsung is redesigning Good Lock with One UI 7 alongside global Play Store release - 9to5Google
item.description:
Samsung is redesigning Good Lock with One UI 7 alongside global Play Store release

Publication Date: December 30, 2024   Source: 9to5Google

Samsung's Good Lock app, known for enabling extensive customization of One UI, is set to become available globally via the Google Play Store in 2025. This expansion coincides with the launch of One UI 7.

  • Good Lock offers deep customizations for Samsung devices without requiring root access.
  • Starting with One UI 7, Good Lock will be available in all countries and on the Google Play Store.
  • The app is undergoing a redesign to enhance usability and add features like filtered app listings.
  • Currently in beta, One UI 7 is expected to roll out with the Galaxy S25 series in January.

“Starting with One UI 7.0 Good Lock, Good Lock can be downloaded from the Play Store as well as the Galaxy Store, and Good Lock can be used in all countries. This is something that many customers have been asking for, and we expect that this will provide more convenient accessibility to more Galaxy users.”

This update aims to make the Good Lock app more accessible and functional for users worldwide, enhancing the customization experience for Samsung devices.

item.title: Dollar trade finance dips as demand for local currencies rises: JPMorgan's Zhang | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Dollar Trade Finance Dips as Demand for Local Currencies Rises: JPMorgan's Zhang

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

There has been a mild decline in the use of US dollars for trade finance in the Asia Pacific region, with demand for local currency financing increasing to fill the gap, according to a senior banker at JPMorgan.

  • Currency trends show a decrease in US dollar usage in trade finance.
  • Local currency financing is on the rise to bridge the gap.

Currency trends have been very interesting over the last few years, specifically in trade finance, where the bank has observed a mild decrease in US dollar usage, Charley Zhang, head of trade and working capital, APAC at JPMorgan, said in a virtual interview.

This shift in currency usage may have implications for the region's trade dynamics and financial stability.

item.title: Drug firms amp up hiring for top roles as growth beckons | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Drug firms amp up hiring for top roles as growth beckons

Publication Date: 2024 | Source: Mint

India's pharmaceutical companies are significantly increasing their hiring at the executive level to support growth amid favorable geopolitical forces.

  • Drugmakers are focusing on hiring key executives such as chief technology officers (CTOs), chief financial officers (CFOs), and chief human resources officers (CHROs).
  • There is an emphasis on hiring leadership for both emerging and regulated markets.
“The industry is finding it necessary to bolster its leadership team to navigate the expansion,” said an industry executive.

This trend reflects confidence in the pharmaceutical sector's future, with companies positioning themselves to leverage new opportunities.

item.title: Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect - Mint
item.description:
Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect

Publication Date: January 5, 2023 Source: Live Mint

Poco is set to launch its X7 5G series in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G, available exclusively on Flipkart. The company has shared teasers of the designs and key features via social media.

The X7 series showcases an eye-catching design and impressive camera capabilities.

  • Two variants: Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G.
  • Available exclusively on Flipkart.
  • Design details include a squircle camera module for the base model and a pill-shaped camera island for the Pro model.
  • Both models follow Poco's signature black and yellow color scheme.
  • Poco X7 Pro to feature a 50MP main camera and a large battery with fast charging.
  • Pro model powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset, while the base model may use a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC.
  • Expected to have a 120Hz refresh rate and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 protection for the display.
“The Poco X7 5G series emphasizes advanced photography and performance features along with a stylish design.”

This launch is expected to attract significant interest among smartphone enthusiasts, highlighting the ever-evolving technology landscape.

item.title: Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: Live Mint

Poco is set to launch its latest X7 5G series in India on January 9, with two variants on offer: the Poco X7 5G and the Poco X7 Pro 5G. The new smartphones will be sold exclusively on Flipkart, showcasing exciting designs and features through social media teasers.

  • The Poco X7 5G features a centrally-placed squircle camera module, while the X7 Pro 5G has a pill-shaped camera island.
  • Expected color schemes include Poco's signature black and yellow, and dual-tone options for the Pro model.
  • Camera capabilities highlight a 50MP main sensor for both variants, with the Pro utilizing a Sony IMX882 sensor and a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • The X7 Pro 5G will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset while the X7 5G is likely to use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC.
  • Battery capacities include 6,000mAh with 90W fast charging for the Pro model and 5,110mAh with 45W charging for the base model.
  • The displays feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED 1.5K display with a 120Hz refresh rate and Gorilla Glass protection.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for Jan 2025: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered, The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe - blog.playstation.com
item.description:
PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for Jan 2025: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered, The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe

Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: PlayStation Blog

Happy New Year! Kick off your 2025 gaming sessions by taking on (and taking out) a league of corrupted super heroes, race on both sides of the law and escape office life with the PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for January. Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit, and The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe launch January 7 for PlayStation Plus members.

  • Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - An action-adventure shooter where players tackle both single-player and multiplayer challenges against the Justice League in an open-world Metropolis.
  • Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered - Experience high-speed police chases in a visually enhanced, competitive racing game featuring cross-platform multiplayer.
  • The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe - An expanded version of the award-winning indie game with new choices and accessibility features.
All three games will be available to PlayStation Plus members on January 7 until February 3.

Make sure to download December’s games before they’re gone!

item.title: 5G Smartphones Under Rs 10,000: Vivo, Infinix, Motorola, Poco, Lava - News9 LIVE
item.description:
Affordable 5G Smartphones Under Rs 10,000 in 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: News9Live

This article highlights various 5G smartphones available for under Rs 10,000 in 2025, emphasizing the affordability of 5G technology in the current market.

  • Poco C75 5G priced at Rs 7,999 with a 6.88-inch LCD and Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset.
  • Moto G35 5G features a 6.72-inch Full HD+ display, UNISOC T760 processor, and offers dual-camera setup.
  • Infinix Hot 50 5G with a 6.7-inch HD+ display powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset.
  • Vivo T3 Lite 5G offers a 6.56-inch HD+ display and is powered by MediaTek Dimensity 6300.

“You no longer need to spend a huge amount of money to experience 5G connectivity.”

The article demonstrates how more affordable options for 5G smartphones are now accessible, making advanced technology available to a wider audience.

item.title: "Trailer 2, Trailer 3": GTA 6 fans expect certain things from Rockstar Games in 2025 - Sportskeeda
item.description:
GTA 6 Fans Anticipate Major Updates from Rockstar Games in 2025

Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Sportskeeda

2024 was a disappointing year for GTA 6 fans. After the reveal of Grand Theft Auto 6 in 2023, they hoped to get more information about the upcoming title from Rockstar Games, but it was not to be. Now that 2025 is here, fans are hopeful that Rockstar will be a little more communicative this time around.

  • Fans are expecting a release window for GTA 6 from September to November.
  • There are hopes for the release of new trailers and GTA Online updates.
  • Analysts have projected over $3 billion in revenue from the game's first year.
  • Some fans are concerned about possible delays to 2026 or even 2027.
“Trailer 2, Trailer 3, Gameplay trailer(s) and GTA Online reveal. Screenshots, and much more info. Release date (September – November). Pre-orders opening…”

Overall, anticipation is high as fans await further news on the highly anticipated title.
